name: NetSuite item prices to Amazon MWS product prices
description: Sync NetSuite item prices as Amazon MWS product prices.
readme:
Prerequisites: 

 NetSuite items to Amazon MWS product prices:

  1. The products SKU in Amazon and Name in NetSuite should be same.
Setup Instructions:

   NetSuite items to Amazon MWS product prices:

  1. Create a saved search on item record type in NetSuite with following criteria i.e., Type as 'Inventory Item' and configure it on the export.
